alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 5:37AM PST until February 20 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches, heaviest near Mount Hood. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
